General.Name: Marti Technologies Inc.
General.Description: Marti Technologies, Inc. provides tech-enabled urban transportation services to riders in Turkey. It also operates a mobility app that provides multiple transportation services, such as a ride hailing service that matches riders with car, motorcycle, and taxi drivers, as well as operates a fleet of e-mopeds, e-bikes, and e-scooters. In addition, the company offers driver subscription package, which enables riders to purchase the Marti rides in advance by daily or weekly. The company was founded in 2018 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
